text: ane tame temane joso ke te'o (jahannama) same lavavamam avase, apamanita tha'i jhuki padela hase ane transi ankho vade jo'i rahya hase, imanavala'o spasta kahi dese ke kharekhara nukasana uthavanara te loko che, jemane aje kayamatana divase potane ane potana gharavala'one nukasanamam nankhi didha, yada rakho! Ke kharekhara atyacari loko hammesa rahevavali yatanamam che
